    G

    GameModel - Class in application
    The main game model that manages the game state, player movement, enemy behavior, and game logic for the mining adventure game.
    GameModel(String, Difficulty) - Constructor for class application.GameModel
    Constructs a new GameModel with the specified character and difficulty.
    GameModel.Direction - Enum Class in application
    Represents the four possible movement directions for the player.
    getAllKeyCodes() - Method in class application.KeyCodeManager
    Gets all key codes concatenated into a single string.

    GOLD - Enum constant in enum class application.CellType
    Gold ore - premium high-value resource.
    GRASS - Enum constant in enum class application.CellType
    Surface grass block - the top layer of terrain.
    GRAVEL - Enum constant in enum class application.CellType
    Loose gravel material - easy to mine but low value.
